name: Stunt Simulator Multiplayer
description:
Now get on the wheel of the most amazing stunt cars in Stunt Simulator Multiplayer. Fasten your seat belt tight because you will be flying on the highest platforms, you’ll be drifting and driving at high speeds on the stone mountains and through crazy obstacles.
Choose a car, perform amazing stunts and drifts, collect as many points you can get and buy the rest of the cars. Have fun!

Features:
  • 3 Maps
  • 10 Cars
  • Day/night toggle
  • Fun physics
